# Thunderstomp, Greater (Spell)
## Overview
[[Evocation Spells|Evocation]] \[[[Earth Spells|earth]]]

**Level:** [[3rd Level Bloodrager Spells|Bloodrager 3]], [[3rd Level Druid Spells|Druid 3]], [[3rd Level Magus Spells|Magus 3]], [[3rd Level Ranger Spells|Ranger 3]], [[3rd Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 3]], [[3rd Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 3]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 6th-Level Druid Spells List|Druid 6]], [[BoXM 6th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 6]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S

**Range:** 60 ft.

**Area:** 60-ft. line

**Duration:** Instantaneous

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** Yes

**Source:** Advanced Class Guide , pg. 196

This spell functions as *[[Thunderstomp (Spell)|thunderstomp]]*, except as noted. It allows you target multiple creatures with this spell, including creatures more than one size category larger than you. When you attempt the combat maneuver check, apply its result to each creature within the area.
